title: National Parks of New York Harbor: Safety
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Safety            Safety       The National Parks of New York Harbor are located in an urban setting.  Be careful crossing busy streets. Watch your step on uneven surfaces. Guard your valuables. In an emergency, call 911.  To help protect park resources and ensure a safe and enjoyable visit for everyone, please follow park rules and posted regulations.  Pets are not allowed inside public buildings, unless a designated assistance animal. Please dispose of your garbage in trash containers or take it with you when you leave. Bicycles, skateboards and the like are allowed only on designated paths. Security checkpoint screening is required for entrance to African Burial Ground National Monument and before boarding the ferry to Statue of Liberty National Monument and Ellis Island.
